articles.title: PPP loan borrowers are being steered toward forgiveness. Why they should slow down - CNBC
articles.description: Cash-strapped small businesses and their banks can't wait to kick off the forgiveness process. Why some firms might be better off proceeding slowly.
articles.content:
Small businesses that took a forgivable loan this year as well as their banks can't wait to have the balance wiped out, but tax professionals are telling them to slow down.
